---
description: "Always include this when asked to do analysis"
applyTo: "**/*.hs"
---

Analysis should be performed from an architectural perspective, including testability and suitability for the desired application.

Architecturing correct module layouts and separation of concerns, as well as planning RE-architecting is of the **_UTMOST_** importance.

Always put your analysis into an actionable plan, formed as a checklist broken into phases, into .etc/plan.md
